header.title: Our Services
header.subtitle: JM Motors provides a full range of car repairs and servicing. We pride ourselves on using only recommended parts and the latest technology.

services.title: Full Car Servicing
services.description: Comprehensive interim and full servicing for all makes and models to maintain manufacturer warranties and keep your vehicle running smoothly.

services.title: Pre-NCT / DOE Checks
services.description: Rigorous multi-point inspection to prepare your vehicle for the National Car Test, identifying failure points before you go.

services.title: Computer Diagnostics
services.description: Using dealer-level diagnostic software to identify fault codes, engine warning lights, and complex electrical system errors.

services.title: Brakes and Clutches
services.description: Expert replacement and repair of brake pads, discs, calipers, and complete clutch kits including flywheels.

services.title: Exhausts and Emissions
services.description: Exhaust system repair, DPF cleaning, and emission testing to meet environmental standards and pass NCT.

services.title: Batteries and Electrics
services.description: Battery health checks, alternator testing, and replacements with high-quality, long-lasting units.

services.title: Timing Belts
services.description: Critical engine maintenance. Precision replacement of timing belts and water pumps to prevent catastrophic engine failure.

services.title: Wheel Alignment
services.description: 3D laser wheel alignment and balancing to prevent uneven tyre wear, save fuel, and improve handling safety.

services.title: Warning Light Reset
services.description: Resetting service indicators, ABS, ESP, and Airbag lights after professional repair and verification.

services.title: Crash Repairs
services.description: Professional bodywork repairs and panel beating to restore your vehicle to factory condition after a collision.

services.title: All Makes and Models
services.description: We have the tooling and technical data to service cars, vans, and 4x4s of all major manufacturers.

highlight.body: We offer a free collection and return service from your home or workplace within our local area. Let us take the hassle out of your car maintenance.
